title: Ep. 473 - Known By The Friends You Keep
description:
The Left enters Day 5 of mourning dead Iranian terrorist Qassem Suleimani, the press ignores the most prolific rapist in British history, some big little endorsements in the 2020 race, and a proposed split in the Methodist church over the issue of same-sex marriage.

Can't get enough of The Michael Knowles Show? Enjoy ad-free shows, live discussions, and more by becoming an ALL ACCESS member TODAY at: https://dailywire.com/Knowles
